New Records: Michel Aebischer created several chances and scored a goal in the first half.
Breel Embolo scored the final goal for Switzerland on his emotional return to the national team.
Key Match Events: Kwadwo Duah opened the scoring with a goal.
Michel Aebischer scored a beautifully curled effort from the edge of the box.
Breel Embolo sealed the win with a late goal in stoppage time.
Post-Match Reflections: Steve Clarke expressed frustration with Scotland's performance after their match against Germany.
Switzerland's dominant first-half display earned them a 3-1 victory over Hungary.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Hungary struggled to create chances in the first half and were punished for their mistakes.
Player ratings included Michel Aebischer rated 9 out of 10 for his performance.
